casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Marshall HAMMETT. No. 83A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2006. Kelly L. Sandling, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of April 2006 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Eric Marshall Hammett) shall have up to and including the 16th day of May 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of April 2006."
